item.title: Yotta Free
item.description: Yotta Free is a Mac app for making users look drunk. Using both this app and a video conferencing app, you can enjoy online drinking parties without alcohol. Yotta Free changes your face and voice to look drunk in real-time. This app is used face segmentation face-parsing.Pytorch and vocoder PyWorld inside. This app is developed with my friends in a one-day hackathon HackDay 2021.

item.title: Insticker
item.description: Insticker is a system for instantly generating a sticker from a target word and your emotion. This system works with a laptop PC and a cutting plotter. Insticker project is in a one-day hackathon HackDay 2019.

item.title: HELLO WORLD!
item.description:
HELLO WORLD! is a web application for pair programming and video meeting. Pair programming is often used in education for programming, however, it is difficult to find a good teacher in your neighborhood. HELLO WORLD! helps them to do pair programming online.

Features:

  • Edit codes at the same time
  • Chat in video communication
  • Run codes in a browser

This project is joint work with my friends in a hackathon JPHacks 2016. This is an overview of the project and its detail is here in Japanese.
